Requirements The wyvern @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} a creature this turn using Powerful Dive

Effect The wyvern can Fly at half Speed while holding the creature in their claws, carrying that creature along with them and dropping it at the end of their movement. Alternatively, the wyvern can Strike the creature with their stinger with a +2 circumstance bonus.

Xulgath Warrior.name: Xulgath Warrior
Xulgath Warrior.publicNotes:
Xulgath warriors strike with fury and eager cruelty, always ready for the next fight. The taking of prizes from battle—including weapons and items stolen from defeated foes along with grislier trophies harvested from fallen victims' flesh—is a popular pursuit among these vicious reptiles, and those whose armor and scales are most adorned are awarded the greatest respect (and perhaps fear) from their kin.

Reptilian humanoids who live in the uppermost reaches of the Darklands, xulgaths (known as troglodytes to many surface-dwelling folk) often attack intruders in their territory on sight. They live in simple familial communities called clutches, battling rival groups and other aggressive Darklands inhabitants in order to survive. They occasionally raid surface settlements, usually at the behest of cruel, bloodthirsty leaders who are often themselves in the thrall of more powerful creatures like nagas or demons. A typical xulgath has dull gray, dark gray, or ashen scales, with a long tail and bony protrusions that run the length of their spine. A typical xulgath is 5 feet tall and weighs 150 pounds.

Although today the xulgaths are brutal and scattered, they were one of the first intelligent humanoids to rise in the primeval world, once ruling over a mighty empire that stretched throughout the Darklands. Today, all that remains of this era are ruins of massive stone ziggurats and crumbling cities found within some of the larger caverns. Some groups of xulgaths continue to live among these ruins, venerating their ancestors' accomplishments, while others consider these areas taboo and leave them to become infested with Darklands vermin. Sages don't agree on why the ancient xulgath civilization fell. Some suspect it was the result of losing several wars waged against serpentfolk, while others suggest that the corruptive influence of demon worship rotted their culture from within.

Certainly, many xulgath settlements continue to worship demons to this day, paying homage and offering live sacrifices to demons or other terrible creatures from the Outer Rifts. Occasionally, a xulgath mystic can call forth and bind a lesser demon to help serve the group, but one who delves too deep into occultism might summon a more powerful fiend that either tears the xulgaths to pieces or seizes control of the settlement.

Lamia Matriarch.name: Lamia Matriarch
Lamia Matriarch.publicNotes:
The brilliant and powerful lamia matriarchs possess boundless ambition, always seeking to bring more people and territory into the clutches of their kind. Consequently, they become rulers of other lamia. For all their cruelty toward other creatures, they're fierce protectors of other lamia, and consequently, they quickly come to rule cults or warbands. Regardless of the lamia's gender, these ascended lamias are always known as matriarchs. A lamia matriarch is set apart from their kindred by the occult power they pursue, and some have even had grand designs to break the animalistic curse that transformed them. However, every attempt so far has led to the matriarch's fall.

Lamias are bloodthirsty victims of an ancient curse for which they blame the gods. Most lamias are humanoid from the waist up but have the lower bodies of serpents. Sinister magic comes naturally to a lamia, and they prefer the use of illusions to deceive prey for later consumption, or simply to torture.
Lamia Matriarch.allSaves: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
The lamia matriarch can take on the appearance of a Medium humanoid. This doesn't change their Speed or their attack and damage modifiers with their Strikes, but it does prevent them from using their cursed touch. Each lamia matriarch has a fixed humanoid form that resembles their upper torso when in their true form. This is the only humanoid form they can adopt using this ability.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Matriarch's Caress.name: Matriarch's Caress
Matriarch's Caress.description: The lamia touches a creature, who must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} on a critical failure). If the target fails additional saves against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 (increases by 2 on a critical failure, to a maximum of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4}). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours.

Scimitar Storm.name: Scimitar Storm
Scimitar Storm.description: The lamia matriarch makes a scimitar attack against each enemy within reach. Each attack counts toward their multiple attack penalty, but the penalty does not increase until after all the attacks. The first enemy they damage is subject to Matriarch's Caress.

Elephant.name: 大象 Elephant
Elephant.publicNotes:
生在大象聚居地附近的人往往小心谨慎，以免激怒大象，但即使采取了预防措施，大象有时还是会横冲直撞。当一头大象暴怒时，普通人几乎无能为力。此外，一群愤怒或惊恐的大象可以轻易地摧毁整个村庄。

通过大象长长的、灵活的象鼻和令人印象深刻的长牙，人们立刻就能认出它们。在不同的地方的大象有不同的特征。大象在许多地区被当做驮畜，但其实它们非常聪明，必须非常小心地对待。

Grabbing Trunk.name: 鼻卷 Grabbing Trunk
Grabbing Trunk.description: 大象的象鼻攻击命中中型或更小体型的生物后可以让其陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]状态。如果大象移动，则可以带着受擒的生物一起移动。

Sargassum Heap.name: 马尾藻簇 Sargassum Heap
Sargassum Heap.publicNotes: 马尾藻簇是一团漂浮在大洋上的半智慧海藻，它用致幻孢子引诱受害者。受其影响的人被孢子吸引到马尾藻簇前，憧憬着心中的愿望。可能是失去的爱人，需要帮助的孩子，魅惑的人鱼，干燥陆地的愿景，等等。一旦猎物靠近，马尾藻簇就会用它的海藻卷须将其扑倒并将其压死。

Wavesense (Precise) 60 feet.name: 水波感知（精确）60尺 Wavesense (Precise) 60 feet

Mirage Spores.name: 蜃景孢子 Mirage Spores
Mirage Spores.description:
120尺

马尾藻簇会不断产生致幻孢子，使受影响的人将怪物视为他们最渴望的东西。弥漫范围内的每个生物都必须成功通过一次@Check[type:will|dc:22]豁免，否则就会被马尾藻簇@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]，并在该生物的回合中被迫向其移动。陷入迷魂的生物还将陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]。如果马尾藻簇发动攻击，迷魂状态只会在被攻击的生物身上结束。如果豁免成功，生物会临时免疫蜃景孢子24小时。

Dwarf Warrior.name: 矮人战士 Dwarf Warrior
Dwarf Warrior.publicNotes:
依靠着精良的装备以及天生的勇气，矮人战士能够坚守阵地并对抗强大的敌人。如果能得到尊重，这些战士会成为你一辈子的盟友；但如果怠慢他们，这些矮人会成为你余生之中的眼中钉。

矮人的力量来源于他们那坚毅的决心、高质量的装备以及将怨恨之心延续数个世纪的能力。

Dwarven Doughtiness.name: 矮人顽勇 Dwarven Doughtiness
Dwarven Doughtiness.description: 矮人通常能够沉着冷静地面对迫在眉睫的危险。在此矮人回合结束时，其惊惧状态会降低2点而非正常的1点。

Shielded Charge.name: 持盾冲锋 Shielded Charge
Shielded Charge.description: 矮人战士举起盾牌并行走两次。

Dybbuk.name: 附鬼 Dybbuk
Dybbuk.publicNotes:
被称为附鬼的虚体魂魄源于在来世不得安息的灵魂，这通常是因为它们生前犯下了严重的罪过。据说，这些灵魂通过附身于受害者来逃避来世的惩罚。只有通过诱捕、威吓甚至摧毁这些魂魄，凡人才有希望将它们赶走。

附鬼通常是男性魂魄，藏身于被占据的受害者体内。它们的占据对象通常是新婚之夜的年轻女性，这常被人视为不协婚姻的预兆，尤其是在那些包办婚姻中。男性和非二元性别受害者也确实存在，不过数量较少，而且通常也是在多舛婚姻的新婚之夜。没人知道为什么这种场合会引来附鬼，可能是附鬼那羁傲不驯的灵魂试图给社会最严格的一面带来混乱。

被附鬼占据的受害者可能会大声喧哗、粗鲁无礼、拒绝饮食、做出淫行或在受害者家中制造麻烦。占据结束后，受害者对这些事件不会任何记忆。

某些受过专门训练的祭司可以通过驱魔来驱除受害者身上的附鬼。通常，这种方法会结合熏烟、吹响公羊角和诵读圣诗。然而，驱魔极其困难和危险，而且由于这些恶灵的强大力量，这仪式要求祭司具备丰富的知识和技能。

Malevolent Possession.name: 恶毒占据 Malevolent Possession
Malevolent Possession.description:
附鬼尝试占据它邻接的实体生物。效果如同法术@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]（@Check[type:will|dc:34]），但持续时间无限；此外，由于附鬼没有肉体，它不会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]，效果结束时也不会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]，但倘若（它占据的）身体被打到失去意识或被杀，它会受到@Damage[5d6[spirit]]伤害。

如果附鬼用恶毒占据控制了一个目标，当附鬼离开时，目标对被附身的时段只有零散的记忆。

Merfolk Wavecaller.name: Merfolk Wavecaller
Merfolk Wavecaller.publicNotes:
Merfolk wavecallers use their primal magic to defend their people. Their ability to asphyxiate airbreathers makes them crucial when surface dwellers invade.

Elegant, mysterious, and graceful; all this and more can be said of merfolk. These enigmatic people resemble humanoids with delicate features from the waist up but with the fins and tail of a massive fish from the waist down. Found in nearly all of Golarion's oceans, merfolk are as varied in appearance as humans, their skin ranging from pale to umber and all shades in between, while their gleaming scales shimmer with the majesty of the sea.

Hydraulic Asphyxiation.name: Hydraulic Asphyxiation
Hydraulic Asphyxiation.description:
Requirements The target is fully submerged in water, within 30 feet of the merfolk wavecaller, and holding its breath

Effect The merfolk wavecaller commands the tides to crush their foe's throat, rooting the target in place and forcing it to choke up precious air. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round and immediately lose [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}' worth of air (or twice that on a critical failure).

Dezullon.name: 大猪笼草 Dezullon
Dezullon.publicNotes:
大猪笼草是一种危险的食肉性猪笼草植物，生长在树冠茂密的森林，或是在几乎不可能生长其他植物的沼泽深处。当它们不在树冠上晒太阳时，就会顺着森林的下层植被捕食。大猪笼草很聪明，知道一些生物容易被闪亮的东西吸引，所以有时会用这些东西设伏。如果仅仅因为大猪笼草下半部分是根须就认为它移动速度很慢的话，那是个愚蠢的错误；许多冒险家死于这些超级灵巧的植物。此外，这种危险的植物是专业的攀爬者，这让它们的追击更难以被逃脱。

饥饿的大猪笼草能从中间的叶瓶中吐出它腐臭的、会影响心智的消化液，从而让猎物失去平衡。它消化器官中除了含有强酸，还有一种酶，一旦被排出体外，就能让受害者产生强烈的幻觉和失忆症。这种副作用使得大猪笼草在一些圈子里备受追捧，包括狂热的吸毒者、实验室的医生和使用毒药的罪犯。

尽管能够与植物沟通的德鲁伊和精类取得了一定的成功，但培育大猪笼草的尝试通常都以失败告终。与此同时，在自己研究中寻求突破的角龙，或从神秘的神祇那里寻求幻象的沼泽巨人会用他们强大力量狩猎碾压这些植物。

大猪笼草的种类很多，其中包括笨重的巨猪笼草，其体型之大让人难以置信；还有一些长着杯状的小叶瓶，沿着长长的常春藤蔓延，就像乌贼触须上的吸盘，还有一些则长着数百片血红、锋利的叶子，从瓶内伸出来，就像水蛭的牙齿一样。最后这一种尤其危险，因为这些叶子可以把关在瓶中的生物的肉和内脏全部剃干净。

Regeneration 15 (Deactivated by Fire).name: 再生15（火焰使其无效） Regeneration 15 (Deactivated by Fire)

Amnesia Venom.name: 失忆毒液 Amnesia Venom
Amnesia Venom.description:
豁免骰 DC29强韧

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg] (1轮)

阶段2 措手不及且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]，措手不及且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

阶段4 同阶段3，且永久遗忘过去一小时 (1轮)

Root.name: 扎根 Root
Root.description: 直到下一次行动前，大猪笼草看上去就像一株普通猪笼草植物。它在假装为非生物植物的欺骗检定和DC自动得到41的结果（在森林或者沼泽中为44）。

Manticore (Scorpion Tail).name: 蝎狮（蝎尾） Manticore (Scorpion Tail)
Manticore (Scorpion Tail).publicNotes:
蝎狮是狮子、龙和人的混合怪物，嗜好人肉。它与众不同的尾巴上点缀着豪猪一样的尖刺，会像甩动鞭子一样甩动尾巴来攻击猎物。这些致命的尖刺赋予它强大的力量，甚至能杀死天空中的装备精良的勇士。

虽然它那似人非人的面孔看起来像具备敏锐的智慧，但其实大部分这种生物都是头脑简单的杀手。然而，它们也是聪明的欺骗者，它们的声音带有一种奇特的音律，能吸引不知情的旅行者进入伏击地点。野蛮无知的类人生物（尤其是那些守序和邪恶的）在发现蝎狮之后会对它顶礼膜拜，在这种情况下蝎狮会变得很懒惰，乐于享受崇拜者带给它的食物和财富，但是当供奉变得缺乏时，它会开始享用这些崇拜者们。更强大的类人生物遇到蝎狮时可以通过威吓和暴力使它屈服，甚至成为坐骑。只要它的肚子被人肉填满，并在主人的领导下获得胜利，它就会对主人无比忠诚。

蝎狮喜欢从猎物的尸体上掠夺战利品，这既能满足它的虚荣心，又能证明它的实力。它对金钱不感兴趣，但有时也接受黄金和珠宝作为贡品。由于蝎狮喜欢在远离人类的荒野中独处，因此它们乐于独自享用战利品，而不愿意向游客炫耀。

Manticore Venom.name: 蝎狮毒 Manticore Venom
Manticore Venom.description:
豁免骰 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d10[poison]]伤害且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 @Damage[2d10[poison]]伤害且力竭1 (1轮)

阶段3 @Damage[2d10[poison]]伤害且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮)

Lion.name: 狮子 Lion
Lion.publicNotes:
狮子是合作的猎手，整群的雌狮会一起埋伏，共同捕并杀死猎物。雄狮通常体型更大，鬃毛很长，当它们捕食时，往往会单独行动。

自然界中很少有掠食者能与猫的潜行能力相匹敌。大型猫科动物分部于任何环境，它们通常会与居住地保持距离。当文明人侵入大型猫科动物的猎场时，这些动物往往会不顾一切地对粗心的旅行者进行攻击。

Pack Attack.name: 群起攻之 Pack Attack
Pack Attack.description: 如果狮子的目标同时处于狮子另外两个盟友的触及范围内，则狮子对它造成1d4额外伤害。

Pounce.name: 猛扑 Pounce
Pounce.description: 狮子行走，在行动结束后衔接1次打击。如果狮子在执行此行动前处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]状态，则它保持藏匿直到该次打击结束。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 狮子对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]的生物造成额外1d6精准伤害。

Hryngar Bombardier.name: 地底矮人掷弹手 Hryngar Bombardier
Hryngar Bombardier.publicNotes:
地底矮人化学家懂得如何制造炼金手雷。他们的习俗会激励他们不断进行实验和革新，然而其周遭地域的敌对性质迫使他们讲这些革新集中在武器或其他战争工具上。地底矮人掷弹手迫切地想要从下属手里窃取笔记和秘密，逼迫自己的学徒靠偷工减料来取得成果，然后再兴高采烈地掠夺他们赚来的荣誉和利润。对于那些发现自己被迫投入战斗的地底矮人掷弹手来说，每次投掷的手雷都代表着观察他们亲手所产生的痛苦的新机遇，之后他们便会急切地讲这些数据纳入到下一次实验或创新中，用于创造出更加可怕的折磨他人的工具。

在地表下方深处，被称为地底矮人的冷酷矮人族群顽强地辛苦劳作，声称其他矮人先祖的地下家园属于自己。很久以前，地底矮人的领袖拒绝与他们的“表亲”一同冒险前往地表，放弃了寻天之旅（Quest for Sky）。名为卓斯卡（Droskar）的被流放的矮人神祇拯救了这些地底矮人，使其摆脱了幽暗地域（Darklands）中困扰他们的恐怖之物，为他们提供了力量、诡计与知识，以此换取对他们永无止境的奴役。许多地底矮人认为通过比他们的同族更加卖力地劳作，就可以建设出比位于太阳之下的那些伟大得多的社会，在没日没夜永不停歇的劳作中从星球的金属矿脉里索取无穷的财富。

通过卓斯卡的祝福以及自身那骇人的工作伦理，地底矮人如今统治者上层幽暗地域中纳-沃斯（Nar-Voth）地区的很大一片领土，人们经常能看到地底矮人的商队在巨大甲虫的协作牵引下穿过隧道。地底矮人的领导层通常由卓斯卡的强大神仆所组成，辅以可怖且无人能挡的武艺高超的战士，再加上天生的异能术法，这使得他们能够击败任何能够对地底矮人统治产生直接威胁的存在。地底矮人社会中近乎所有方面都受到严密等级制领导的控制，由监工指导各行各业的下属。
Hryngar Bombardier.allSaves: 对抗魔法的豁免+2状态加值

Alchemical Grenades.name: 炼金手雷 Alchemical Grenades
Alchemical Grenades.description: 地底矮人掷弹手携带6枚炼金手雷，这可以造成酸蚀、寒冷、或火焰伤害外加相同类型的1点持续伤害和1点溅射伤害（通常每种伤害类型2枚）。地底矮人掷弹手每日会用易于收集的材料补充这些手雷。

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的豁免+2状态加值 +2 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Quick Bombardier.name: 迅捷掷弹手 Quick Bombardier
Quick Bombardier.description: 地底矮人掷弹手以交互动作取出1枚炼金手雷并以远程打击将其投掷出去。

Great Cyclops.name: Great Cyclops
Great Cyclops.publicNotes:
Gigantic loners, the great cyclopes are their lesser kin writ large. They're stronger and more violent, but their uncontrolled vision of possible futures has driven them beyond reason. They see every moment as a potential storm of uncontrollable fury and, out of a desperate desire for peace, quiet, and an end to their hunger, lash out at any who come near. Wise creatures avoid great cyclopes at all cost. It's fortunate for humanoids that great cyclopes prefer to dwell far from settlements.

Debate has long raged over the origins of these massive, destructive giants. They are so large that it had long been assumed they were used as beasts of burden by their lesser kin, now free to hunt and kill without restraint. Other scholars believe the great cyclops is the ultimate fate of the entire cyclops species. Whatever foolish decision or wayward curse caused the end of their civilization is still playing out, occasionally causing a cyclops to withdraw from their own kind, lose all semblance of intellect, and mutate into a lumbering, feral colossus.

The cyclopes are violent giants with a tragic past. Although they possess only one eye, they could once see far more than most, possessing occult wisdom and divinatory magic that gave them the mystic ability of foresight. But their legendary oracular powers failed to prevent the fall of their society, and the vast kingdoms of the cyclops long ago collapsed into ruin. Today, cyclopes have forgotten much of what they once knew, and they skulk among the crumbling remains of their fallen cities like forgotten kings and queens of their own fallen kingdoms.

Flash of Brutality.name: Flash of Brutality
Flash of Brutality.description:
Frequency once per day, and recharges when the great cyclops uses Ferocity.

Trigger The great cyclops succeeds at an attack roll.

Effect The attack becomes a critical success.

Powerful Charge.name: Powerful Charge
Powerful Charge.description: The great cyclops Strides twice and makes a horn Strike. If it moved at least 20 feet away from its starting position, the Strike's damage is increased to 3d10+20.

Horned Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster).name: Horned Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster)
Horned Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster).publicNotes:
The magic that flows through primal dragons can manifest more animalistic or bestial features in a given type of dragon. Notably among these are the massive paired horns of the horned dragon. While their bulky frames, natural coloration, and prominent ridged scales are all remarkable in their own way, it's the horns that are most obvious and striking at first glance. Horned dragons use their horns to impale their prey in a quick and brutal display of their might. They are generally contemplative and have a fixation on knowledge and self-discipline, traits belied by their bestial appearance. As a result, horned dragons are generally more open to speaking with outsiders.

Dragons come in myriad forms, with many having magical abilities or connections to magic. Some dragons draw greater power from magic than others, allowing them to manifest abilities or alter their physiques with prolonged exposure to magic. These dragons become more powerful as they age and strengthen their connections with their magical origins. Scholars debate the classification of these dragons, with some preferring the name magical dragons and others using traditional dragons due to their connection to specific magical traditions. Regardless of their names, these dragons share a number of characteristics: their ability to tap into magical energies, intensified might and cunning as they grow older, and an inclination to hoard vast amounts of treasure and wealth.

Draconic Spellcasters

Each dragon features a sidebar on spellcasting dragons of that type. To make a dragon spellcaster, remove the dragon's Draconic Frenzy and Draconic Momentum abilities, and give them the spells outlined in their sidebar. You can swap out any number of these with other spells, provided you keep the same number of spells for each rank. You might also want to increase the dragon's Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier by 1 or 2 to reflect their mastery of magic.
Horned Dragon (Ancient, Spellcaster).allSaves: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值

Camouflage.name: Camouflage
Camouflage.description: The dragon can Hide in natural environments even if they don't have cover.

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对抗魔法的豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Miasma.name: Miasma
Miasma.description:
20 feet.

After the dragon uses their Poison Breath, a cloud of poison gas continues to emanate from their body for 1 round. Any creature that ends its turn in the miasma takes @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:37|basic:true] save).

Any creature in the miasma is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} and treats other creatures as concealed. The dragon can see through this concealment.

Twisting Tail.name: Twisting Tail
Twisting Tail.description:
Trigger A creature within reach of the dragon's tail uses a move action or leaves a square during a move action it's using

Effect The dragon makes a tail Strike at the creature with a –2 penalty. If the Strike hits, the dragon disrupts the creature's action.

Forest Passage.name: Forest Passage
Forest Passage.description: The horned dragon ignores any difficult terrain caused by plants, such as bushes, vines, and undergrowth. Even plants manipulated by magic don’t impede their progress.

Impaling Charge.name: Impaling Charge
Impaling Charge.description:
Requirements The dragon doesn't have a creature impaled on their horn

Effect The dragon attempts to gore a foe. They Stride, then attempt a horn Strike. On a hit, the target becomes impaled on the dragon's horn. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} while on the horn (and can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} as normal). The dragon doesn't need to use additional actions to keep the impaled creature grabbed. If the dragon moves, they bring the grabbed creature along with them.

Poison Breath.name: Poison Breath
Poison Breath.description:
The dragon breathes a toxic cloud that deals @Damage[18d6[poison]] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:37|basic:true] save).

They can't use Poison Breath again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Poison Breath]]{1d4 rounds}.

Trackless Journey.name: Trackless Journey
Trackless Journey.description: The horned dragon always gains the benefits of Cover Tracks in natural surroundings, even while moving at full speed.

Umbral Gnome Rockwarden.name: Umbral Gnome Rockwarden
Umbral Gnome Rockwarden.publicNotes:
Umbral gnome rockwardens follow druidic teachings and commune with the natural elemental influences and denizens of the Darklands.

Gnomes are known for being creative and curious. They stand at around 3 feet tall, and their vivid personalities match their naturally vivid hair and eye color. Gnomes possess a natural connection to their ancestral home, the First World. They crave adventure and new experiences to fight off an ancestry-wide affliction known as the Bleaching. Gnomes who fail to dream and innovate begin to slowly lose their color and fall into a deep depression.

A notable subgroup of gnomes called umbral gnomes typically have gray or brown skin with a stony texture, and thin, pale hair or bald pates. Umbral gnomes are most numerous in the Darklands, where they go by the name drathnelar. Umbral gnomes often attribute these physical changes to the gnome deity regarded as the first of their kind, Nivi Rhombodazzle. Nivi was a surface gnome who traveled deep into the Darklands and was ultimately rewarded with demigodhood when she exchanged a particular gemstone with the dwarven deity, Torag. Nivi is immune to the Bleaching, and umbral gnomes are often immune or resistant to it as well.

Bugbear Prowler.name: Bugbear Prowler

Bushwhack.name: Bushwhack
Bushwhack.description: The bugbear prowler Strides up to 10 feet and attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} a creature they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by. If they succeed, they also deal fist damage to that creature.

Mauler.name: Mauler
Mauler.description: The bugbear prowler gains a +3 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against creatures they have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

Bugbear Prowler.publicNotes:
Bugbear prowlers specialize in the art of lurking in the shadows.

These stealthy and cruel goblinoid creatures delight in spreading fear and tormenting their victims. Bugbears are the monsters lurking in the closet and hiding under the bed. Preying on remote farmsteads, bugbears reveal their presence with thumps in the night or creaks of boards to build lurking dread and arouse suspicion and fear.

Megalodon.name: 巨齿鲨 Megalodon
Megalodon.publicNotes:
巨齿鲨的体型、力量、和凶残程度都令人难以置信，它们在深海和浅海中四处游荡，以满足巨大的胃口。巨齿鲨的存在无疑会对当地的水生生态系统造成影响。

从远古时代开始，各种形状和体积的鲨鱼就一直在海洋中出没，到目前为止基本没什么变化。它们是高效、无情的掠食者，拥有多排锋利的牙齿，能在瞬间撕碎猎物。鲨鱼在水中能闻到血液的神奇能力让它们出现在任何水中屠杀的现场。

Blood Scent.name: 血液嗅觉 Blood Scent
Blood Scent.description: 巨齿鲨在水中能闻到最远1英里以内的血腥味。

Breach.name: 跃浪击 Breach
Breach.description: 巨齿鲨最多以满速游泳，然后跃出水面最多25尺高，在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]过程中的任何时候对一个生物进行一次牙咬打击（这让巨齿鲨可以攻击到离水面30尺的生物）。在打击之后，巨齿鲨落回水中。

Savage.name: 撕咬 Savage
Savage.description:
需求 巨齿鲨在本回合的上一个动作是颚咬打击并且命中

效果 巨齿鲨打击命中的目标受到@Damage[2d12[slashing]]伤害。

Twigjack.name: 枝节妖 Twigjack
Twigjack.publicNotes:
它们自认为是“真正的”枝节妖，会与他们所崇拜的精类一同生活在荒野森林中。

枝节妖是失调森林的住民，残酷且热爱恶作剧的精类及自身所处森林的结合作用下形成了他们。枝节妖的身体由多刺的荆棘以及藤蔓编织而成。在枝节妖头顶上生长的蓬松苔藓就宛如他的头发一般。细碎且破败的枝条在他脸上断裂开来形成了嘴部。新生的叶片和枝条随机地从他的身上伸展开来。格拉利昂的许多茂密森林中都至少有一小撮枝节妖生活在灌木丛中。

尽管具有暴力倾向且十分好斗，但枝节妖极为关心被他们认为属于自己的森林。这些生物会骚扰那些深入到自己的森林领域中的外来者，将其中哪怕最意志坚定的探索者、林务工作者、以及旅行者逼走，这种行为在那些入侵者于森林中开辟道路时尤甚。然而，在牵涉到其他森林生物时，他们并不会具有很强的领地意识。当木族生物，尤其是精类，集合起来对抗外部威胁时，该地区的枝节妖哪怕没有得到邀请，也会急切地前来参加战斗。

Bramble Jump.name: 荆丛迁跃 Bramble Jump
Bramble Jump.description:
需求 枝节妖处于灌木丛中

效果 枝节妖爬进灌木丛中并立即传送至60尺范围内的一处有灌木丛的方格。此次移动不会触发反应动作

Splinter Spray.name: 裂片飞溅 Splinter Spray
Splinter Spray.description:
枝节妖从体内发射大量裂片和荆棘，对@Template[type:cone|distance:15]范围内造成@Damage[4d6[piercing]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true]豁免）。

枝节妖在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Splinter Spray]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用裂片飞溅。

Giant Viper.name: 巨蝰 Giant Viper
Giant Viper.publicNotes:
巨蝰的毒牙令人畏惧，管牙更是有匕首一般长。巨蝰注入的毒液数量庞大，会导致严重的血液凝结，从而彻底夺走受害者的生气。

蛇的种类多样，从盘踞密林缠卷猎物的蟒蛇，到有着致命啮咬的剧毒蝰蛇。不管怎样，所有的蛇都是通过张开其双颚整个吞咽猎物，再利用充满力量的肌肉将食物从喉腔转移至胃部消化。

Coiled Strike (Special).name: 蜷曲借机（特殊） Coiled Strike (Special)
Coiled Strike (Special).description:
如同反应打击，但是巨蝰仅能在蜷曲后使用反应动作。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ReactiveStrike]

Coil.name: 蜷曲 Coil
Coil.description: 巨蟒用一个动作蜷曲起来，这可以使得它的毒牙攻击范围从5尺增加到10尺。在巨蟒使用毒牙进行打击后，它就会舒展开来。

Giant Viper Venom.name: 巨蝰毒液 Giant Viper Venom
Giant Viper Venom.description:
豁免骰 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d6[poison]]伤害 (1轮)

阶段2 @Damage[1d6[poison]]伤害并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}

Yeti.name: Yeti
Yeti.publicNotes:
Nearly a myth, a yeti is rarely seen—and even when it is, it is often too late. Yetis dwell amid the highest, most remote peaks of the world, coming down from their snowy mountain holds to raid, steal livestock, and sometimes feed their insatiable urges for slaughter and destruction. Those folks who live at the foot of a yeti-ruled mountain warn of the "abominable snowmen": monstrous, furcovered humanoids who leave strange and bloody tracks in the snow.

In actuality, most yetis protect the world rather than hunt its other denizens, guarding eldritch portals that link the mortal Universe and other, much stranger dimensions of reality. From within these snow-covered arches and ancient stone doorways, aliens, living nightmares, fiends, and worse can emerge into the world. Yetis who guard these portals sometimes succumb to the horrors within, taking on the bloodthirsty urges and horrific behaviors of the very monsters they strive to guard against. Driven out of their clans and forced to wander alone, they give rise to the myth of the abominable snowman. These exiled yetis often fully embrace the corrupting elements that caused their exile in the first place, growing more powerful and more deadly.
Yeti.allSaves: +4 status to all saves vs. fear and dreams

Snowblind.name: Snowblind
Snowblind.description: When @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hiding}, the yeti is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} by any snowfall, even if it's not thick enough to make other creatures concealed.

Nightmare Guardian.name: Nightmare Guardian
Nightmare Guardian.description: Yetis gain a +4 status bonus to saves against fear and against spells and abilities that affect dreams. A yeti that falls prey to a supernatural nightmare loses this ability and becomes permanently enraged, gaining a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls and a -1 status penalty to AC.

Vanish.name: Vanish
Vanish.description:
Trigger The yeti is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} while not in combat, and a creature would observe it.

Effect The yeti Strides or Climbs up to half its Speed to a location where it can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, then Hides. If its new Stealth check result meets or exceeds the triggering creature's Perception DC, the yeti remains hidden.

Arctic Passage.name: Arctic Passage
Arctic Passage.description: The yeti ignores difficult terrain caused by ice or snow.

Grizzly Arrival.name: Grizzly Arrival
Grizzly Arrival.description:
Trigger The yeti hits a creature in the first round of combat and the yeti was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from that creature at the start of combat.

Effect Each enemy within @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} that witnesses the attack (including the target of the attack) must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:23] save. On a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}; on a critical failure, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 4}.

Pitborn Adept.name: Pitborn Adept
Pitborn Adept.publicNotes:
One of the most common types of nephilim is the pitborn, who bear a demonic corruption infesting their mortal bloodline.

Many immortals dwell upon the other planes of the Great Beyond. Some are benevolent and kind, like angels. Others are cruel and destructive, like demons. And some fit roles outside of morality, like psychopomps. It's far from unheard of for mortals and immortals alike to become entangled romantically, and the children of such engagements carry a supernatural element in their bloodlines for generations to follow. After the first generation, this otherworldly influence usually lies dormant, but now and then, the influence can manifest strongly in descendants many years later. These inheritors of extraplanar legacies are known collectively as planar scions.

Nephilim

Nephilim are planar scions with a connection to the planes of the Outer Sphere. Some are obviously tied to realms such as Heaven or Hell, while others are cryptic amalgams of metaphysical traits.

Drain Bonded Item.name: Drain Bonded Item
Drain Bonded Item.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements The adept hasn't acted yet on this turn

Effect The adept expends the power stored in its staff. This gives the adept the ability to cast one prepared spell it had already previously cast today (choosing a different spell rank each time), without spending a spell slot. The adept must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements.

Soulbound Doll (Cruel).name: 缚魂娃娃（残忍） Soulbound Doll (Cruel)
Soulbound Doll (Cruel).publicNotes:
缚魂娃娃是怪诞的人体模型或娃娃，被灌注了一小片已故凡人的灵魂。这些小小的构装体是由于各种各样的原因被创造出来的——比如说作为同伴或仆人——但是他们的自由意志意味着它们对于他们的创造者并非必然服从。法莱斯玛的信徒常常憎恶缚魂娃娃，认为这是对灵魂自然循环的扭曲，而墓穴女士的崇拜者乐意看到缚魂娃娃的破灭，而不考虑其行为，会将覆灭缚魂偶作为对伟大彼岸的重要服务。

在一系列缚魂构装体中，缚魂娃娃的制造是最简单的，这些构装体包括人形的缚魂人偶，强大的缚魂躯壳，和作为卫兵的缚魂兵马俑。用非自愿的活物创造娃娃是残忍的，非自愿的供体可以抵抗这个过程，通过一次意志检定来对抗创造者的手艺 DC，如果不能阻止灵魂供体的死亡，则会毁掉娃娃。如果某人生前同意使用，也可以用其灵魂制作娃娃。

冒险者遇到的缚魂娃娃通常都是某种守卫；尽管娃娃体型娇小，但灵魂碎片的力量让娃娃的拳头比旁人想象的更加危险。此外，鉴于娃娃的身材，灵魂碎片还能赋予娃娃一个威力巨大的法术。由于具有自主性和非凡的智慧，缚魂娃娃偶尔会被它们的制作者用作强大得多但无意识的构装体的管理者，使这些娃娃能够控制远远超出其自身能力的防御系统。

虽然缚魂娃娃包包含一名刚死不久的人的一小部分灵魂，但其实这不影响死者复活，或直接前往来世。这种灵魂提取的过程对活着的灵魂供体来说则是致命的。

灵魂碎片通常会注入一个镶嵌在娃娃胸部或脖子的灵魂聚焦宝石（硬度10）。灵魂碎片一般会保留原灵魂的强烈个性特征，但娃娃会从初始状态开始不断学习，这意味着它的性格和能力可以改变，可能会变得更像灵魂供体，也可能在自己的道路上越走越远。即使缚魂娃娃被摧毁，它的灵魂聚焦宝石也能保留娃娃的记忆。如果被摧毁的缚魂娃娃的灵魂聚焦宝石是完好的，那么它可以被一些精于缚魂操作的人重新放置到一个新娃娃的身体里，通过这种方法可以很有效的让缚魂娃娃重生。

Personality Fragments.name: 人格碎片 Personality Fragments
Personality Fragments.description: 缚魂娃娃拥有一部分灵魂提供者的人格碎片，尽管它没有任何生前的记忆。这使得缚魂娃娃与供体灵魂的强烈个性特征相匹配。由于它的灵魂碎片，因此缚魂娃娃拥有无法像大多数构装体一样对精魂免疫。

Wolf.name: 狼 Wolf
Wolf.publicNotes:
狼成群结队地生活和捕猎，但与人们普遍认为的相反，狼群中的领头者并非是最强壮的狼，而是通常由一对狼、它们的幼崽和以前交配季节的幼崽组成。孩子们通常在成年后离开父母的狼群，然后他们会寻找自己的伴侣去其他地方组建自己的狼群。

类人动物一般不被狼视为猎物，但特殊的环境会导致这些动物攻击他们，特别是在冬季和其他传统猎物（主要是鹿和麋鹿）稀少的情况下。一些生物，比如强大的吸血鬼，可以召唤狼来帮助战斗。

狼在森林、山丘和其他荒野上游荡，成群结队地捕猎围攻，然后再杀死猎物。像大多数食肉动物一样，狼更喜欢攻击它们能找到的最无力或最脆弱的猎物。

Pack Attack.name: 群起攻之 Pack Attack
Pack Attack.description: 对于触及范围内至少有两名狼的盟友的生物，狼的打击造成1d4点额外伤害。

Giant Scorpion.name: 巨蝎 Giant Scorpion
Giant Scorpion.publicNotes:
这些巨大、可怕的蛛形纲动物通常从头到尾长8尺。巨蝎是群居动物动物，可以作为战兽，深受许多沙漠地区的怪物尤其是鬣狗人偏爱。巨蝎在野外非常常见，它们在山腰的洞穴里筑巢，或者在浅层的沙土下挖洞，等待猎物靠近。还有一些特殊的变种，如光滑而苍白的生活在地底的巨蝎，或是体型更加庞大的其他种类。

蝎子是生活在沙漠、森林、热带稀树大草原和荒地的包复着甲壳的虫害，它们是致命的蛛形纲动物，有着强大的钳子和令人痛苦的尾刺。蝎子在几乎所有的气候带中出没，它们以耐心的潜行和原始的蛮力捕食猎物。大多数蝎子生活在地下洞穴里，要么作为独行猎手，要么组成蝎群。这些蛛形纲动物是如此可怕和危险，以至于在许多文化中，它们被视为神或死亡和防卫的二元论象征。

Tremorsense (Imprecise) 60 feet.name: 震颤感知（模糊）60尺 Tremorsense (Imprecise) 60 feet

Reactive Strike (Stinger Only).name: 反应打击（仅针刺） Reactive Strike (Stinger Only)

Giant Scorpion Venom.name: 巨蝎毒 Giant Scorpion Venom
Giant Scorpion Venom.description:
豁免骰 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18|basic:true]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d10[poison]]伤害并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 @Damage[2d10[poison]]伤害并力竭1 (1轮)

阶段3 @Damage[2d10[poison]]伤害并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮)

Tomb Jelly.name: 墓穴果冻怪 Tomb Jelly
Tomb Jelly.publicNotes:
墓穴果冻怪是一种活体的原生质团块，具有黄色、灰色和黑色混合在一起的难看色调。它们那具有酸性的躯体能溶解皮肉，但会保留其他物质，这包括受害者完整的装备和骸骨。部分古代文化会将尸骸与墓穴果冻怪一同埋入石棺，让泥怪分解肉体、清洁和抛光骸骨。

阴湿的地下城与阴影遮蔽的树林中生活着胶质怪、黏菌、以及其他泥怪。尽管这些生物可能并无恶意，但部分泥怪能长成硕大的身躯并具有无法满足的食欲。

Motion Sense.name: 感知运动 Motion Sense
Motion Sense.description: 墓穴果冻怪能通过震动以及气流来感受周遭事物的运动。

Bound in Death.name: 缚于死亡 Bound in Death
Bound in Death.description: 墓穴果冻怪将少量自身的生物质泼洒在自身触及之内的自愿不死生物身上。目标恢复5点HP，并且其近战打击会获得墓穴诅咒的好处，持续至它的下个回合结束为止。

Flesh-dissolving Acid.name: 溶解皮肉 Flesh-dissolving Acid
Flesh-dissolving Acid.description: 墓穴果冻怪的酸蚀仅能伤害肉体。

Tomb Curse.name: 墓穴诅咒 Tomb Curse
Tomb Curse.description: 被墓穴果冻怪的伪足命中的生物承受@Damage[1d6[persistent,void]]伤害。若该生物在此持续伤害存续期间死亡，那么其尸骸会受到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.xRgU9rrhmGAgG4Rc]（peaceful rest）的影响，不过墓穴果冻怪仍能溶解它的肉体。

Aiuvarin Elementalist.name: Aiuvarin Elementalist
Aiuvarin Elementalist.publicNotes:
Commonly referred to as half-elves, aiuvarins often have trouble fitting into society. This can lead to many aiuvarins diverting their full attention towards their own personal pursuits, such as studying spellcasting.

Elves are mysterious and intelligent, and graceful and cunning in battle.

Elemental Field.name: Elemental Field
Elemental Field.description:
The elementalist unleashes powerful static electricity in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] that lasts for 1 minute. All squares in the area become hazardous terrain for other creatures. A creature takes @Damage[1[electricity]] damage each time it moves into one of these squares. While in the area, creatures take a –1 status penalty to saves against electricity spells.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.f8HuM5Ar6SSHNHBx]{Effect: Elemental Field}

Flash Beetle.name: 闪光甲虫 Flash Beetle
Flash Beetle.publicNotes:
这些3尺长的昆虫腹部后面有一对发光器官，能发出明亮的光线，即使是在他们死后，这些器官还能持续发光好几天。闪光甲虫通常被矿工和洞穴冒险者收集起来，因为他们发出的光芒比火把更安全，比油灯更便宜。黑暗之地Darklands 的居民常会驯养和训练这种昆虫，把它们当做宠物、牲畜或者把他们关在笼子里，在那些不习惯黑暗世界的游客们常常光顾的地方作为生物光源。

并不是所有的甲虫都是可以轻易被踩碎的无害生物。在世界各地的温带和热带地区，都可以发现硕大而贪婪的甲虫。它们通常是温和的生物，然而当受到威胁或被激怒时，这些巨型甲虫是相当危险的。它们有力的虫颚和坚硬的外壳让它们成为了具有挑战性的对手。

Luminescent Aura.name: 冷光灵光 Luminescent Aura
Luminescent Aura.description:
10尺。

闪光甲虫的发光器官能为周围提供明亮光照。

Light Flash.name: 闪光 Light Flash
Light Flash.description:
闪光甲虫能发出耀眼的闪光。所有冷光灵光范围内的生物必须成功进行@Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]豁免，否则将被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]1分钟。

随后，闪光甲虫不再发光，失去灵光24小时，并且此期间内无法使用该能力。

Riding Dog.name: 骑乘犬 Riding Dog
Riding Dog.publicNotes:
骑乘犬类型包括体型较大的犬类，如獒犬、猎狼犬和哈士奇，通常由半身人和地精饲养作为坐骑。骑乘犬对主人就像看门犬一样忠诚，不管有没有骑手，它们都很凶猛。和看门犬一样，这些大型犬类在自然界中可能会变成野狗，而且在某些情况下，甚至可能如同狼群一般，对乡村地区的居民造成危险。

它们通过气味探测猎物或掠食者的能力以及它们喜欢和人形生物作伴的习性，使它们成为大多数冒险家的理想宠物。世界上有数百种狗，从粘人的小型观赏犬到肩高接近4尺的肌肉发达的大型犬，几乎在有人居住的任何地方都有它们的身影。体型较大的犬种甚至可以作为小体型冒险者的坐骑，在一些文化中，犬类可以作为驮畜，拉着满载物资的雪橇穿越冰原。无论如何，许多冒险家认为养狗是一件很值得的事情。

Pack Attack.name: 群起攻之 Pack Attack
Pack Attack.description: 犬的打击目标如果位于至少两个盟友的触及范围内，则造成额外1d4伤害。

Goliath Spider.name: 巨硕蜘蛛 Goliath Spider
Goliath Spider.publicNotes:
巨硕蜘蛛生活在丛林的最深处，在那里它们织出神殿那么大的网，捕食像河马那么大的猎物。

很少有害虫能像声名狼藉的蜘蛛那样让人如此恐惧。

Web Sense.name: 蛛网感知 Web Sense
Web Sense.description:
巨硕蜘蛛可以通过震颤感知（模糊）来感知到生物触碰它们蛛网时产生的振动。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Tremorsense]

Spring Upon Prey.name: 饿蛛扑食 Spring Upon Prey
Spring Upon Prey.description:
需求 尚未投掷先攻

触发 当巨硕蜘蛛位于它的蛛网上时，一个生物触碰到蛛网

效果 巨硕蜘蛛自动注意到该生物，并在投掷先攻前，可以在蛛网上进行行走、攀爬或蛛网垂降（Descend on a Web）动作。

Descend on a Web.name: 蛛网垂降 Descend on a Web
Descend on a Web.description:
巨硕蜘蛛用网绳把自己吊在空中，可以垂直下降最多120尺。它可以挂在蛛网上，也可以从蛛网上坠落。它从蛛网上下降的距离不计入坠落伤害。

如果一个生物成功击中蛛网（AC20，硬度5，20HP）时，可以砍断蜘蛛网，导致巨硕蜘蛛坠落。

Goliath Spider Venom.name: 巨硕蜘蛛毒 Goliath Spider Venom
Goliath Spider Venom.description:
豁免骰 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[3d6[poison]]伤害且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1轮)

阶段2 @Damage[3d8[poison]]伤害且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2} (1轮)

阶段3 @Damage[3d10[poison]]伤害且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF][[/br 2d4 #hours]]{2d4小时}

Web Tether.name: 蛛网捆缚 Web Tether
Web Tether.description:
被巨硕蜘蛛蛛网打击命中的生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]，并且和巨硕蜘蛛拴在一起，无法拉开和蜘蛛的距离。

巨硕蜘蛛一次只能拴住一个生物。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]蛛网的DC为30。连接的蛛网绳索可以被一次打击切断（AC 20，硬度5，HP 20），但这并不能直接释放被束缚的生物。

War Horse.name: 战马 War Horse
War Horse.publicNotes: 在许多社会中，马都是坐骑和驮兽。它们是忠诚的和典型的温和生物，对于那些想长途旅行的人来说，它们是无价之宝。较小的种族，像侏儒和半身人，经常使用矮种马作为坐骑，而马是人类和其他中型类人所喜欢的坐骑。大多数人类遇到的马都是驯养的，尽管这些强壮动物组成的大型群落可以在野外找到。

Gallop.name: 奔驰 Gallop
Gallop.description: 战马行走两次，在进行这两次行走时速度有10尺的环境加值。

Riding Pony.name: 矮种骑乘马 Riding Pony
Riding Pony.publicNotes: 在许多社会中，马都是坐骑和驮兽。它们是忠诚的和典型的温和生物，对于那些想长途旅行的人来说，它们是无价之宝。较小的种族，像侏儒和半身人，经常使用矮种马作为坐骑，而马是人类和其他中型类人所喜欢的坐骑。大多数人类遇到的马都是驯养的，尽管这些强壮动物组成的大型群落可以在野外找到。

Gallop.name: 奔驰 Gallop
Gallop.description: 矮种骑乘马行走两次，在进行这两次行走时速度有10尺的环境加值。

Skeletal Champion.name: Skeletal Champion
Skeletal Champion.publicNotes:
These skeletons retain the cunning they possessed in life.

Animated skeletons are among the most common types of undead.

Halfling Street Watcher.name: Halfling Street Watcher
Halfling Street Watcher.publicNotes:
Halflings' keen sight makes them excellent street watchers. Though the job rarely calls for fighting, most street watchers cover themselves head to ankle in whatever armor and weapons they manage to get their hands on.

Despite their small stature, a halfling can prove to be a mighty foe if you find yourself on the wrong side of their frying pan.

Keen Eyes.name: Keen Eyes
Keen Eyes.description:
The halfling gains a +2 circumstance bonus when using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to find @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or undetected creatures within 30 feet of it.

Whenever the halfling targets a creature that is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or hidden from them, reduce the DC of the flat check to 3 for a concealed target or 9 for a hidden one.

Griffon.name: 狮鹫 Griffon
Griffon.publicNotes:
狮鹫是一种高贵的野兽，在许多文化中被尊为自由和力量的象征。它们的身体特征引人注目，有狮子的下半身和大型食肉鸟类的头、翅膀和前肢——通常是鹰，但也有一些具有鹰、隼、甚至是鹗或秃鹰的特征。在罕见的情况下，狮鹫的下半身可能会像其他大型猫科动物，如豹子或老虎。这些变化似乎与狮鹫生活的环境相一致——例如，阿维斯坦（Avistan）北部特别罕见的狮鹫拥有冈格尼尔（Grungir）猞猁的后腿和雪鸮的上半身——尽管情况并非总是如此。有些狮鹫完全没有翅膀。这些无翼狮被称为alces，是一种罕见的突变造成的。在一群正常的狮鹫中，alce被认为是一种畸形儿，这些亚种很少能在它们的初生阶段存活下来。那些成功长的alces 往往比大多数狮鹫更坚韧、更暴力、更冷漠。

野生的狮鹫依靠它们有力的翅膀让自己升空，用敏锐的视力侦察猎物。它们俯冲并抓住猎物的速度令人震惊。它们可能会用锋利的喙撕开猎物的肉，但通常会把猎物带到一个高而隐蔽的地方，在那里它们可以不受打扰地享用大餐。在地面时，它们会隐藏自己，然后猛扑出来伏击猎物，再带着战利品飞走。但是有个例外情况，当一只狮鹫在为它的后代觅食时，它几乎不会把活着的生物带回到巢中，因为这可能会危及它的幼雏。

经验丰富的驯兽师很久以前就学会了如何饲养狮鹫，作为军队或强大角色的坐骑。这种坐骑以其力量、勇敢和忠诚而闻名。它们是最聪明的动物之一，拥有大多数动物通常不具备的智慧；据说骑手选择狮鹫的同时，狮鹫也在挑选它的骑手。训练狮鹫接受被人骑乘的过程是漫长且代价高昂的考验。狮鹫驯兽师为他们的服务收取高额费用，而一个能夸耀自己拥有狮鹫马厩的统治者会受到别人极大的尊敬和嫉妒。

Flying Strafe.name: 飞掠 Flying Strafe
Flying Strafe.description: 狮鹫最多以满速飞行，并在这一行动中的任何时刻进行两次鸟爪打击。每次打击必须针对不同的生物。每次打击正常计算多重攻击减值。

Pounce.name: 猛扑 Pounce
Pounce.description: 狮鹫行走，移动结束后衔接一次鸟爪打击。如果狮鹫在开始此行动前处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]状态，则它保持藏匿直到该次打击结束。

Regal Shriek.name: 威严尖叫 Regal Shriek
Regal Shriek.description:
狮鹫发出一声尖叫，然后变成可怕的咆哮。@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]范围的每个目标必须尝试@Check[type:will|dc:20]豁免。无论结果如何，生物在10分钟内对所有狮鹫的威严尖叫临时免疫。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。动物在惊惧状态中时还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

大失败 生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}。动物在惊惧状态中时还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]。

Wasp Swarm.name: 黄峰群 Wasp Swarm
Wasp Swarm.publicNotes:
黄蜂的巢是黄蜂通过咀嚼从周围植物中搜寻到的木材纤维做成的，黄蜂会把这些纤维制成类似纸的材料。一个蜂巢可以容纳成千上万的黄蜂。虽然德鲁伊和其他原能惑控师可以扭曲黄蜂的心智从而服从自己的意志，但是大多数蜂群的袭击只是为了保护它们的巢穴，或者被激怒。

普通的黄蜂对勇敢的冒险家来说除了令人不舒服的刺外几乎没有什么威胁，但一大群具有侵略性的这些昆虫——更不用说它们超大的同类了——可以让整个队伍的英雄们倒下。这里的黄蜂一般而言指的是常见品种如胡蜂，但是也存在其他危险的品种，例如迦伦德（Garundi）的变种蜂群，能以超大的数量瞬间毁掉整个村庄。

Swarming Stings.name: 成群叮咬 Swarming Stings
Swarming Stings.description: 每个位于黄蜂占据方格内的敌人受到@Damage[2d8[piercing]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true]豁免）附加黄蜂毒液。豁免失败的生物还会暴露在黄蜂毒的影响下。

Wasp Venom.name: 黄蜂毒 Wasp Venom
Wasp Venom.description:
豁免骰 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[1d6[poison]]伤害 (1轮)

阶段2 @Damage[2d6[poison]]伤害并@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (2轮)
